title: Proof of Wojtkowski's Falling Particle Conjecture
abstract:
In this paper we present an unconditional proof of Wojtkowski's Ergodicity
Conjecture for almost every system of 1D perfectly elastic balls falling down
in a half line under constant gravitational acceleration. Namely, by
introducing a new algebraic approach, we prove that almost every such system is
(completely hyperbolic and) ergodic.
